# JOB EXPECTATIONS ## Boxer [italic]This job is primarily for roleplay and not considered as important as other roles.[/italic]
The Boxer is responsible for entertaining the crew. They can achieve this by fighting in the ring.
## Do - Put on a show and fight in the ring. - (Optional) An 80s training montage.
## Don't - Fight outside the ring. - Use the role as an excuse to be a shitter. - Lose any more braincells.
